mapper.insert: insert into chat_image (id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, image_address, group_chat_record_id, group_id, private_chat_record_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{imageAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupChatRecordId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{privateChatRecordId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update chat_image set gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, image_address = #{imageAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_chat_record_id = #{groupChatRecordId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, private_chat_record_id = #{privateChatRecordId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, image_address, group_chat_record_id, group_id, private_chat_record_id from chat_image where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, image_address, group_chat_record_id, group_id, private_chat_record_id from chat_image
